Class DatabaseManager

    • seng202.team1.Model.DatabaseManager

extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the local and remote databases.
    Author:
    Ridge Nairn, Ollie Chick

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static void connect()
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates local database file, and required tables.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database cannot be connected to / instantiated.

      • isDatabaseConnected

        public static boolean isDatabaseConnected()
        Checks to see if thedatabase is currently connected.
        Returns:
        true if the database is connected.

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Returns:
        the connection to the database

      • deleteDatabase

        public static void deleteDatabase()
        Deletes database, and all records. Primarily used for cleaning up after test cases.

      • addRecord

        public static void addRecord(DataPoint point)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a single record to the database. The type of the record is identified and is stored in its respective table.
        Parameters:
        point - A point to be added to the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when record cannot be added.

      • addBikeTrip

        public static void addBikeTrip(BikeTrip trip)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a single bike trip record to the database.
        Parameters:
        trip - An instance of BikeTrip to be added to the trip database table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when the row could not be inserted

      • recordExists

        public static boolean recordExists(DataPoint point)
        Checks to see if a record point is currently stored in the database. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED.
        Parameters:
        point - A point to be checked if it exists in the database.

      • uploadLocalRecords

        public static void uploadLocalRecords()

      • getTrips

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BikeTrip> getTrips(int n,
                                                     int m)
        Fetches an ArrayList of BikeTrips from the database, of m - n size.
        Parameters:
        n - lower bound to be fetched, inclusive.
        m - upper bound to be fetched, exclusive.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of BikeTrip objects of size m - n.

        Returns the number of BikeTrip records stored in the database.

      • getNumberOfRowsFromType

        public static int getNumberOfRowsFromType(java.lang.Class c)
        Returns the number of records of a certain type stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        c - Class of which the count is to be queried.
        Returns:
        number of records to type c in database
